Token.Abstract: Parses a link to extract the action type, object type, and entity id. These values can be used for loading the appropriate item from the data store.

ReturnValue.Abstract:
a dictionary with the following values:
* KCSFacebookOGAction - the story's action type * KCSFacebookOGObjectType - the story's object type * KCSFacebookOGEntityId - the id of the entity in the data store

Token.Abstract: Publish an open graph story to the user's timeline.

Parameter.Name: entityId
Parameter.Abstract: the KCSEntityKeyId of the object in the mapped collection

Parameter.Name: action
Parameter.Abstract: the actionType. This must be one of the ones specified in the Open Graph data link in the Kinvey console

Parameter.Name: objectType
Parameter.Abstract: the object type of the entity. A collection can be mapped to multiple object types

Parameter.Name: extraParams
Parameter.Abstract: optional action parameters. E.g. tags (friends), place, starttime, endtime, etc.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: the callback for publishing to Open Graph. actionId is the id for the published story; this can be used to read, update, or delete the story separately using the Facebook SDK or API. errorOrNil will the error object if one was generated.
